reviewText: I am heartily tired of this flic, but my kids love it to death.  It's their first exposure to the Care Bears, and they really seem drawn to its simple lessons and old-fashioned animation.  The three episodes (all involving Auntie Freeze and Professor Coldheart) hearken back to a very different style of kids' entertainment, and despite the thin plots and saccharine nature of the Care Bear "life lessons," my children really respond to the stories.  You'll shake your head (you know you're old when you remember this stuff from the first time around), but your kids will be totally absorbed.
